7zip.description: 7-Zip is a free and open-source file archiver utility. It supports several compression formats and provides a high compression ratio, making it a popular choice for file compression.

autohotkey.description: AutoHotkey is a scripting language for Windows that allows users to create custom automation scripts and macros. It is often used for automating repetitive tasks and customizing keyboard shortcuts.

alacritty.description: Alacritty is a fast, cross-platform, and GPU-accelerated terminal emulator. It is designed for performance and aims to be the fastest terminal emulator available.

bulkcrapuninstaller.description: Bulk Crap Uninstaller is a free and open-source uninstaller utility for Windows. It helps users remove unwanted programs and clean up their system by uninstalling multiple applications at once.

bulkrenameutility.description: Bulk Rename Utility allows you to easily rename files and folders recursively based upon find-replace, character place, fields, sequences, regular expressions, EXIF data, and more.

AdvancedRenamer.description: Advanced Renamer is a program for renaming multiple files and folders at once. By configuring renaming methods the names can be manipulated in various ways.

devtoys.description: DevToys is a collection of development-related utilities and tools for Windows. It includes tools for file management, code formatting, and productivity enhancements for developers.

etcher.description: Etcher is a powerful tool for creating bootable USB drives with ease.

openrgb.description: OpenRGB is an open-source RGB lighting control software designed to manage and control RGB lighting for various components and peripherals.

OVirtualBox.description: Oracle VirtualBox is a powerful and free open-source virtualization tool for x86 and AMD64/Intel64 architectures.

neofetchwin.description: Neofetch is a command-line utility for displaying system information in a visually appealing way.

OPAutoClicker.description: A full-fledged autoclicker with two modes of autoclicking, at your dynamic cursor location or at a prespecified location.

orcaslicer.description: G-code generator for 3D printers (Bambu, Prusa, Voron, VzBot, RatRig, Creality, etc.)

prucaslicer.description: PrusaSlicer is a powerful and easy-to-use slicing software for 3D printing with Prusa 3D printers.

fastfetch.description: Fastfetch is a neofetch-like tool for fetching system information and displaying them in a pretty way

fileconverter.description: File Converter is a very simple tool which allows you to convert and compress one or several file(s) using the context menu in windows explorer.

googledrive.description: File syncing across devices all tied to your google account

livelywallpaper.description: Free and open-source software that allows users to set animated desktop wallpapers and screensavers.

lockhunter.description: LockHunter is a free tool to delete files blocked by something you do not know.

wiztree.description: WizTree is a fast disk space analyzer that helps you quickly find the files and folders consuming the most space on your hard drive.

qbittorrent.description: qBittorrent is a free and open-source BitTorrent client that aims to provide a feature-rich and lightweight alternative to other torrent clients.

rainmeter.description: Rainmeter is a desktop customization tool that allows you to create and share customizable skins for your desktop.

wingetui.description: UniGetUI is a GUI for Winget, Chocolatey, and other Windows CLI package managers.

autodarkmode.description: Automatically switches between the dark and light theme of Windows 10 and Windows 11

glazewm.description: GlazeWM is a tiling window manager for Windows inspired by i3 and Polybar

dropox.description: The Dropbox desktop app! Save hard drive space, share and edit files and send for signature â€“ all without the distraction of countless browser tabs.

adobe.description: Adobe Acrobat Reader is a free PDF viewer with essential features for viewing, printing, and annotating PDF documents.

affine.description: AFFiNE is an open source alternative to Notion. Write, draw, plan all at once. Selfhost it to sync across devices.

anki.description: Anki is a flashcard application that helps you memorize information with intelligent spaced repetition.

simplenote.description: Simplenote is an easy way to keep notes, lists, ideas and more.

openoffice.description: Apache OpenOffice is an open-source office software suite for word processing, spreadsheets, presentations, and more.

libreoffice.description: LibreOffice is a powerful and free office suite, compatible with other major office suites.

notepadplus.description: Notepad++ is a free, open-source code editor and Notepad replacement with support for multiple languages.

obsidian.description: Obsidian is a powerful note-taking and knowledge management application.

audacity.description: Audacity is a free and open-source audio editing software known for its powerful recording and editing capabilities.

gimp.description: GIMP is a versatile open-source raster graphics editor used for tasks such as photo retouching, image editing, and image composition.

freecad.description: FreeCAD is a parametric 3D CAD modeler, designed for product design and engineering tasks, with a focus on flexibility and extensibility.

blender.description: Blender is a powerful open-source 3D creation suite, offering modeling, sculpting, animation, and rendering tools.

ffmpeg.description: FFmpeg is a powerful multimedia processing tool that enables users to convert, edit, and stream audio and video files with a vast range of codecs and formats.

firealpaca.description: Fire Alpaca is a free digital painting software that provides a wide range of drawing tools and a user-friendly interface.

kdenlive.description: Kdenlive is an open-source video editing software with powerful features for creating and editing professional-quality videos.

krita.description: Krita is a powerful open-source painting application. It is designed for concept artists, illustrators, matte and texture artists, and the VFX industry.

inkscape.description: Inkscape is a powerful open-source vector graphics editor, suitable for tasks such as illustrations, icons, logos, and more.

itunes.description: iTunes is a media player, media library, and online radio broadcaster application developed by Apple Inc.

vlc.description: VLC Media Player is a free and open-source multimedia player that supports a wide range of audio and video formats. It is known for its versatility and cross-platform compatibility.

spotube.description: Open source Spotify client that doesn't require Premium nor uses Electron! Available for both desktop & mobile!

spotify.description: Spotify is a digital music service that gives you access to millions of songs, podcasts, and videos from artists all over the world.

obs.description: OBS Studio is a free and open-source software for video recording and live streaming. It supports real-time video/audio capturing and mixing, making it popular among content creators.

Paintdotnet.description: Paint.NET is a free image and photo editing software for Windows. It features an intuitive user interface and supports a wide range of powerful editing tools.

ModernFlyouts.description: An open source, modern, Fluent Design-based set of flyouts for Windows.

musescore.description: Create, play back and print beautiful sheet music with free and easy to use music notation software MuseScore.

Shotcut.description: Shotcut is a free, open source, cross-platform video editor.

kicad.description: Kicad is an open-source EDA tool. It's a good starting point for those who want to do electrical design and is even used by professionals in the industry.

ytdlp.description: Command-line tool that allows you to download videos from YouTube and other supported sites. It is an improved version of the popular youtube-dl.

autoruns.description: This utility shows you what programs are configured to run during system bootup or login

rdcman.description: RDCMan manages multiple remote desktop connections. It is useful for managing server labs where you need regular access to each machine such as automated checkin systems and data centers.

dotnet3.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 3.1 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET Core 3.1.

dotnet5.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 5 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET 5.

dotnet6.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 6 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET 6.

dotnet7.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 7 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET 7.

dotnet8.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 8 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET 8.

dotnet9.description: .NET Desktop Runtime 9 is a runtime environment required for running applications developed with .NET 9.

nuget.description: NuGet is a package manager for the .NET framework, enabling developers to manage and share libraries in their .NET applications.

onedrive.description: OneDrive is a cloud storage service provided by Microsoft, allowing users to store and share files securely across devices.

powerautomate.description: Using Power Automate Desktop you can automate tasks on the desktop as well as the Web.

powershell.description: PowerShell is a task automation framework and scripting language designed for system administrators, offering powerful command-line capabilities.

powertoys.description: PowerToys is a set of utilities for power users to enhance productivity, featuring tools like FancyZones, PowerRename, and more.

terminal.description: Windows Terminal is a modern, fast, and efficient terminal application for command-line users, supporting multiple tabs, panes, and more.

vc2015_32.description: Visual C++ 2015-2022 32-bit redistributable package installs runtime components of Visual C++ libraries required to run 32-bit applications.

vc2015_64.description: Visual C++ 2015-2022 64-bit redistributable package installs runtime components of Visual C++ libraries required to run 64-bit applications.

nvm.description: Node Version Manager (NVM) for Windows allows you to easily switch between multiple Node.js versions.

visualstudio.description: Visual Studio 2022 is an integrated development environment (IDE) for building, debugging, and deploying applications.

vscode.description: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor with support for multiple programming languages.

vscodium.description: VSCodium is a community-driven, freely-licensed binary distribution of Microsoft's VS Code.

yarn.description: Yarn is a fast, reliable, and secure dependency management tool for JavaScript projects.

miniconda.description: Miniconda is a free minimal installer for conda. It is a small bootstrap version of Anaconda that includes only conda, Python, the packages they both depend on, and a small number of other useful packages (like pip, zlib, and a few others).

pyenvwin.description: pyenv for Windows is a simple python version management tool. It lets you easily switch between multiple versions of Python.

fnm.description: Fast Node Manager (fnm) allows you to switch your Node version by using the Terminal

Fork.description: Fork - a fast and friendly git client.

java8.description: Amazon Corretto is a no-cost, multiplatform, production-ready distribution of the Open Java Development Kit (OpenJDK).

java11.description: Amazon Corretto is a no-cost, multiplatform, production-ready distribution of the Open Java Development Kit (OpenJDK).

java17.description: Amazon Corretto is a no-cost, multiplatform, production-ready distribution of the Open Java Development Kit (OpenJDK).

java21.description: Amazon Corretto is a no-cost, multiplatform, production-ready distribution of the Open Java Development Kit (OpenJDK).

jetbrains.description: Jetbrains Toolbox is a platform for easy installation and management of JetBrains developer tools.

lazygit.description: Simple terminal UI for git commands

neovim.description: Neovim is a highly extensible text editor and an improvement over the original Vim editor.

nodejs.description: NodeJS is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine for building server-side and networking applications.

nodejslts.description: NodeJS LTS provides Long-Term Support releases for stable and reliable server-side JavaScript development.

python312.description: Python is a versatile programming language used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.

python313.description: Python is a versatile programming language used for web development, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and more.

rustlang.description: Rust is a programming language designed for safety and performance, particularly focused on systems programming.

starship.description: Starship is a minimal, fast, and customizable prompt for any shell.

sublimetext.description: Sublime Text is a sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose.

swift.description: Swift is a general-purpose programming language that's approachable for newcomers and powerful for experts.

unity.description: Unity is a powerful game development platform for creating 2D, 3D, augmented reality, and virtual reality games.

cmake.description: CMake is an open-source, cross-platform family of tools designed to build, test and package software.

dockerdesktop.description: Docker Desktop is a powerful tool for containerized application development and deployment.

git.description: Git is a distributed version control system widely used for tracking changes in source code during software development.

gitextensions.description: Git Extensions is a graphical user interface for Git, providing additional features for easier source code management.

githubcli.description: GitHub CLI is a command-line tool that simplifies working with GitHub directly from the terminal.

githubdesktop.description: GitHub Desktop is a visual Git client that simplifies collaboration on GitHub repositories with an easy-to-use interface.

gitkrakenclient.description: GitKraken Client is a powerful visual Git client from Axosoft that works with ALL git repositories on any hosting environment.

godotengine.description: Godot Engine is a free, open-source 2D and 3D game engine with a focus on usability and flexibility.

golang.description: Go (or Golang) is a statically typed, compiled programming language designed for simplicity, reliability, and efficiency.

winscp.description: WinSCP is a popular open-source SFTP, FTP, and SCP client for Windows. It allows secure file transfers between a local and a remote computer.

putty.description: PuTTY is a free and open-source terminal emulator, serial console, and network file transfer application. It supports various network protocols such as SSH, Telnet, and SCP.

brave.description: Brave is a privacy-focused web browser that blocks ads and trackers, offering a faster and safer browsing experience.

chrome.description: Google Chrome is a widely used web browser known for its speed, simplicity, and seamless integration with Google services.

chromium.description: Chromium is the open-source project that serves as the foundation for various web browsers, including Chrome.

arc.description: Arc is a Chromium based browser, known for it's clean and modern design.

edge.description: Microsoft Edge is a modern web browser built on Chromium, offering performance, security, and integration with Microsoft services.

firefox.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions.

firefoxesr.description: Mozilla Firefox is an open-source web browser known for its customization options, privacy features, and extensions. Firefox ESR (Extended Support Release) receives major updates every 42 weeks with minor updates such as crash fixes, security fixes and policy updates as needed, but at least every four weeks.

floorp.description: Floorp is an open-source web browser project that aims to provide a simple and fast browsing experience.

librewolf.description: LibreWolf is a privacy-focused web browser based on Firefox, with additional privacy and security enhancements.

mullvadbrowser.description: Mullvad Browser is a privacy-focused web browser, developed in partnership with the Tor Project.

tor.description: Tor Browser is designed for anonymous web browsing, utilizing the Tor network to protect user privacy and security.

vivaldi.description: Vivaldi is a highly customizable web browser with a focus on user personalization and productivity features.

PaleMoon.description: Pale Moon is an Open Source, Goanna-based web browser available for Microsoft Windows and Linux (with other operating systems in development), focusing on efficiency and ease of use.

clonehero.description: Clone Hero is a free rhythm game, which can be played with any 5 or 6 button guitar controller.

eaapp.description: EA App is a platform for accessing and playing Electronic Arts games.

epicgames.description: Epic Games Launcher is the client for accessing and playing games from the Epic Games Store.

geforcenow.description: GeForce NOW is a cloud gaming service that allows you to play high-quality PC games on your device.

gog.description: GOG Galaxy is a gaming client that offers DRM-free games, additional content, and more.

heroiclauncher.description: Heroic Games Launcher is an open-source alternative game launcher for Epic Games Store.

itch.description: Itch.io is a digital distribution platform for indie games and creative projects.

playnite.description: Playnite is an open-source video game library manager with one simple goal: To provide a unified interface for all of your games.

prismlauncher.description: Prism Launcher is a game launcher and manager designed to provide a clean and intuitive interface for organizing and launching your games.

sidequest.description: SideQuestVR is a community-driven platform that enables users to discover, install, and manage virtual reality content on Oculus Quest devices.

steam.description: Steam is a digital distribution platform for purchasing and playing video games, offering multiplayer gaming, video streaming, and more.

ubisoft.description: Ubisoft Connect is Ubisoft's digital distribution and online gaming service, providing access to Ubisoft's games and services.

vesktop.description: A cross platform electron-based desktop app aiming to give you a snappier Discord experience with Vencord pre-installed.

thunderbird.description: Mozilla Thunderbird is a free and open-source email client, news client, and chat client with advanced features.

slack.description: Slack is a collaboration hub that connects teams and facilitates communication through channels, messaging, and file sharing.

discord.description: Discord is a popular communication platform with voice, video, and text chat, designed for gamers but used by a wide range of communities.
